column4: i modified the grub2 file but still can't get rid of the menu with kernel options can someone help me?
what do you want to get rid of? The OS select screen?
Okay, I was reading about how to do this just a few days ago.
I'll check. I know there's a fairly simple way to do it...
I think I know how to do it.
If you open up the terminal and type "sudo gedit /etc/default/grub" then you should see the grub configuration file
In there, remove the # before the part that says "GRUB_HIDDEN_TIMEOUT=0"
Then, once that's removed, you'll need to update the complete settings file.
You already uncommented GRUB_HIDDEN_TIMEOUT=0 and ran update-grub?
And the timeout is still there? Hmm...
